testcase.classname: title.Report a problem submission for SSD normal User
testcase.name: Report a problem submission for SSD normal User

failure.message: failed Report a problem submission for SSD normal User

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Report a problem submission for SSD normal User
Given I have an open web browser Then I am on the Realm selection page Then I select "4cb03fa0-83ad-46e2-a936-09ab31af377e" When I login with "linda.kim" and "linda.kim1234" Then I should be on the home page When I mouseover on menu and click submenu "Report a problem" Then It open a popup Then I am selecting the first value from "_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field1" Then I fill "Some test Problems" from "_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field2" Then I click button "Report a Problem" Then I should see "Thank you!"
Message:
Unable to locate element: {"method":"id","selector":"_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field1"} (Selenium::WebDriver::Error::NoSuchElementError) [remote server] file:///tmp/webdriver-profile20120625-7481-36uosu/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver_component.js:5034:in `unknown' [remote server] file:///tmp/webdriver-profile20120625-7481-36uosu/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver_component.js:6573:in `unknown' [remote server] file:///tmp/webdriver-profile20120625-7481-36uosu/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver_component.js:273:in `unknown' [remote server] file:///tmp/webdriver-profile20120625-7481-36uosu/extensions/fxdriver@googlecode.com/components/driver_component.js:471:in `unknown' ./features/liferay/step_definitions/all_steps.rb:611:in `/^I am selecting the first value from "([^\"]*)"$/' features/liferay/report_problem.feature:22:in `Then I am selecting the first value from "_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field1"'

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Report a problem happy cancelation for SLI admin User
Given I have an open web browser When I go to the login page When I login with "slcoperator" and "slcoperator1234" Then I should be on the home page When I mouseover on menu and click submenu "Report a problem" Then It open a popup Then I am selecting the first value from "_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field1" Then I fill "Some test Problems" from "_1_WAR_webformportlet_INSTANCE_SeFBCcJut1Pr_field2" Then I click button "Report a Problem" Then I should see "Thank you!"
Message:
